name: Consummate Carrion
description:
Join these crafty imps in crafting some ridiculous stories! In this adaptation of exquisite corpse, you'll write collaborative stories with friends by continuing each other's writing, but you'll only get to see the last few words of what they wrote. Shenanigans and whimsy will inevitably ensue.

NOTE: This game uses peer-to-peer multiplayer. To host a game, you'll need to open port 31400 (by default; can be changed) on your router and give the other players your external IP address.
